SEARCH
Package aor.fpbackend.bean

Class NotificationBean

java.lang.Object
aor.fpbackend.bean.NotificationBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NotificationBean extends Object implements Serializable
EJB Stateless bean responsible for managing notifications within the application. Handles creation of various types of notifications including individual messages, project join requests, task assignments, group messages, and project approvals/rejections. Provides methods for marking notifications as read and retrieving unread notifications for users.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • createIndividualMessageNotification

      public void createIndividualMessageNotification(IndividualMessageEntity messageEntity)
      Creates a notification for an individual message and persists it. Sends the notification to the recipient's user sessions using WebSocket.
      Parameters:
      messageEntity - The entity representing the individual message.

    • createProjectJoinRequestNotificationsForProjectAdmins

      public void createProjectJoinRequestNotificationsForProjectAdmins(ProjectMembershipEntity projectMembershipEnt)
      Creates notification(s) for project administrators when a user requests to join their project. Each project manager/administrator receives a notification if the requesting user's role is set as 'PROJECT_MANAGER'.
      Parameters:
      projectMembershipEnt - The entity representing the membership request.

    • createNotificationForProjectJoinRequestApprovedOrRejected

      public void createNotificationForProjectJoinRequestApprovedOrRejected(ProjectMembershipEntity projectMembershipEntity, boolean approved)
      Creates a notification for a user whose project join request has been approved or rejected.
      Parameters:
      projectMembershipEntity - The entity representing the project membership request.
      approved - Boolean indicating whether the request was approved (true) or rejected (false).

    • createNotificationForProjectInviteFromAProjectManagerToUser

      public void createNotificationForProjectInviteFromAProjectManagerToUser(ProjectMembershipEntity projectMembershipEntity)
      Creates a notification for a user who has been invited by a project manager to join a project.
      Parameters:
      projectMembershipEntity - The entity representing the project membership invitation.

    • createNotificationForProjectManagersKnowUserApproval

      public void createNotificationForProjectManagersKnowUserApproval(ProjectMembershipEntity projectMembershipEntity, boolean approved)
      Creates a notification for project managers informing them about user approval or rejection for project membership.
      Parameters:
      projectMembershipEntity - The entity representing the project membership.
      approved - Indicates whether the user's request to join the project was approved.

    • createNotificationForUserRemovedFromProject

      public void createNotificationForUserRemovedFromProject(ProjectMembershipEntity projectMembershipEntity)

      Creates a notification for a user who has been removed from a project or whose invitation to join a project has been cancelled.
      Parameters:
      projectMembershipEntity - The entity representing the project membership.

    • createNotificationProjectApprovalSendAllMembers

      public void createNotificationProjectApprovalSendAllMembers(ProjectEntity projectEntity, UserEntity userEntity, boolean approved)
      Creates notifications for all members of a project about its approval or rejection by a user.
      Parameters:
      projectEntity - The entity representing the project.
      userEntity - The entity representing the user who approved or rejected the project.
      approved - A boolean indicating whether the project was approved (true) or rejected (false).

    • createNotificationForAllPlatformAdminsProjectApproval

      public void createNotificationForAllPlatformAdminsProjectApproval(ProjectEntity projectEntity)
      Creates notifications for all platform administrators about a project awaiting approval.
      Parameters:
      projectEntity - The entity representing the project awaiting approval.

    • createNotificationMarksAsResponsibleInNewTask

      public void createNotificationMarksAsResponsibleInNewTask(UserEntity userEntity, TaskEntity taskEntity)
      Creates a notification for a user who has been marked as responsible in a new task.
      Parameters:
      userEntity - The user entity who is marked as responsible.
      taskEntity - The task entity in which the user is marked as responsible.

    • createNotificationMarksAsExecutorInNewTask

      public void createNotificationMarksAsExecutorInNewTask(UserEntity userEntity, TaskEntity taskEntity)
      Creates a notification for a user who has been marked as executor in a new task.
      Parameters:
      userEntity - The user entity who is marked as executor.
      taskEntity - The task entity in which the user is marked as executor.

    • getUnreadNotifications

      public List<NotificationGetDto> getUnreadNotifications(jakarta.ws.rs.core.SecurityContext securityContext)
      Retrieves unread notifications for the authenticated user.
      Parameters:
      securityContext - The security context containing the authenticated user's principal.
      Returns:
      A list of NotificationGetDto objects representing unread notifications.

    • markNotificationsAsRead

      public void markNotificationsAsRead(Long notificationId) throws EntityNotFoundException
      Marks a notification as read by setting its 'read' flag to true.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - The ID of the notification to mark as read.
      Throws:
      EntityNotFoundException

    • createNotificationForGroupMessage

      public void createNotificationForGroupMessage(GroupMessageEntity groupMessageEntity, List<UserEntity> projectMembers)
      Creates notifications for a group message sent to project members.
      Parameters:
      groupMessageEntity - The GroupMessageEntity containing the group message details.
      projectMembers - The list of project members to receive the notification.
